title: Updated last night, rebooted with 100% battery, and now it will not turn or/boot up
content:
Updated last night, rebooted with 100% battery, and now it will not turn or/boot up in any way I tried.

I do get the vibration and sometimes just a white line screen flicker when I try to reboot, hard reset, but it will not show the screen.

Phone is plugged in, not showing any charging status, or red light.
